T02D1762:253a-1: aa dhishth'a na ma h'a k'a la s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1762:253a-3: byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1762:253a-4: myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1762:253a-5: zhabs gdub dang bcas bi n'a ya ga mnan //
T02D1762:253a-6: nag po chen po stag gi sham thabs can //
T02D1762:253a-7: phyag drug sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1762:253a-8: g-yas pa phreng ba bar ma gri gug 'dzin //
T02D1762:253a-9: tha ma d'a ma ru ni drag tu 'khrol //
T02D1762:253a-10: g-yon pa thod pa dang ni mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1762:253a-11: de bzhin zhags pa bzung nas 'dzin par byed //
T02D1762:253a-12: drag po'i zhal la mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
T02D1762:253a-13: spyan gsum drag po dbu skra gyen du 'bar //
T02D1762:253a-14: dpral bar sindhu ra yis legs par byugs //
T02D1762:253a-15: rin chen thod skam lnga yis dbu la brgyan //
T02D1762:253a-16: spyi bor mi bskyod pa yis rgyas btab brtan //
T02D1762:253a-17: khrag 'dzag mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal can //
T02D1762:253a-18: sna tshogs padma nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor steng //
T02D1762:253a-19: ye shes me dbung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhengs //
T02D1762:253a-20: shing las byon nas gtor ma len par dmigs //
T02D1762:253a-21: aom badzra ma h'a k'a la kshim kshe tra bighn'an bi na ya ka h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
T02D1762:253a-22: lan bdun brjod la gtor ma gtang /
T02D1762:253a-23: byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs
